PMP_Description.message: Secure vault for storing and managing shared sensitive information such as passwords, documents & digital identities of enterprises.

multi_approval_user.message: The Password request has been already approved by $COUNT$ administrators. Your approval is pending.

same_user_approval.message: The password access is requested by you. So you cannot process it. It is pending for other administrator to approve.
